tool.name: Plot Volcano - Summary
tool.description: Produces one volcano plot for each tested contrast in the input DEG table. It can be sorted by either fold change, t-statistic, or p-value. The returned dataset includes one row for each significant g
tool.command: echo 'galaxy_params.json' && cat 'galaxy_params.json' && echo '' && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --bool-values add_features label_features displace_feature_labels flip_vplot use_default_x_axis_limit use_default_y_axis_limit use_default_grid_layout save_plots && echo 'cleaned_params.json' && cat 'cleaned_params.json' && echo '' && mosuite plot_volcano_summary --json=cleaned_params.json

param.name: moo_input_rds
param.label: MOO input Rds
param.help: File path to read the input multiOmicDataSet object (MOO)

param.name: moo_output_rds
param.label: Summary dataframe output Rds
param.help: File path to output summary data as an Rds file

param.name: signif_colname
param.label: Significance column name
param.help: column name of significance values (e.g., adjusted p-values or FDR). This column will be used to determine which points are considered significant in the volcano plot.

param.name: signif_threshold
param.label: P-Value Threshold
param.help: Numeric value specifying the significance cutoff for p-values (i.e. filters on `signif_colname`)

param.name: change_threshold
param.label: Log2 Fold Change Threshold
param.help: Numeric value specifying the fold change cutoff for significance (i.e. filters on `change_colname`)

param.name: feature_id_colname
param.label: Gene Names Column
param.help: The column from the counts data containing the Feature IDs (Usually Gene or Protein ID). This is usually the first column of your input Counts Matrix. Only columns of Text type from your input Counts Matrix will be available to select for this parameter. (Default: `NULL` - first column in the counts matrix will be used.)

param.name: value_to_sort_the_output_dataset
param.label: Choose How to sort the output dataset
param.help: How to sort the output dataset. Options are "fold-change" or "p-value".

param.name: num_features_to_label
param.label: Number of Genes to Label
param.help: Number of top features/genes to label in the volcano plot. Default is 30.

param.name: add_features
param.label: Add Custom Features List To Labels
param.help: Add custom_gene_list To Labels. Set TRUE when you want to label a specific set of features (features) in the "custom_gene_list" parameter" IN ADDITION to the number of features you set in the "Number of Features to Label" parameter.

param.name: label_features
param.label: Label Only Custom Features List
param.help: Select TRUE when you want to label ONLY a specific list of features(features) given in the "custom_gene_list" parameter.

param.name: custom_gene_list
param.label: Custom Feature/Gene List
param.help: Provide a list of features (comma separated) to be labeled on the volcano plot. You must toggle one of the following ON to see these labels: "Add features" or "Label Only My Feature List".

param.name: default_label_color
param.label: Default Feature Label Text Color
param.help: Set the color for the text used to add feature (gene) name labels to points.

param.name: custom_label_color
param.label: Feature Label Text Color for custom features list
param.help: Set the color for the specific list of features (features) provided in the "Feature List" parameter.

param.name: label_x_adj
param.label: Label Position Adjustment (X-Axis)
param.help: adjust position of the labels on the x-axis. Default: 0.2

param.name: label_y_adj
param.label: Label Position Adjustment (Y-Axis)
param.help: adjust position of the labels on the y-axis. Default: 0.2

param.name: line_thickness
param.label: Line Segment Thickness
param.help: Set the thickness of the lines in the plot. Default: 0.5

param.name: label_font_size
param.label: Label Font Size
param.help: Set the font size of the labels. Default: 4

param.name: label_font_type
param.label: Label Font Type
param.help: Set the font type of the labels. Default: 1

param.name: displace_feature_labels
param.label: Displace Feature Labels
param.help: Set to TRUE to displace gene labels. Default: FALSE. Set TRUE if you want to displace the feature (gene) label for a specific set of features. Make sure to use custom x- and y- limits and give sufficient space for displacement; otherwise other labels than the desired ones will appear displaced.

param.name: custom_gene_list_special_label_displacement
param.label: Gene List Special Label Displacement
param.help: Provide a list of features (comma separated) for which you want special displacement of the feature label.

param.name: special_label_displacement_x_axis
param.label: Special Label Displacement (X-Axis)
param.help: Displacement of the feature label on the x-axis. Default: 2

param.name: special_label_displacement_y_axis
param.label: Special Label Displacement (Y-Axis)
param.help: Displacement of the feature label on the y-axis. Default: 2

param.name: color_of_signif_threshold_line
param.label: Color of P-Value Threshold Line
param.help: Color of the significance threshold line. Default: "blue"

param.name: color_of_non_significant_features
param.label: Color of Non-Significant Features
param.help: Color of the non-significant features. Default: "black"

param.name: color_of_logfold_change_threshold_line
param.label: Color of Log Fold Change Threshold Line
param.help: Color of the log fold change threshold line. Default: "red"

param.name: color_of_features_meeting_only_signif_threshold
param.label: Color of Features Meeting Only P-Value Threshold
param.help: Color of the features that meet only the significance threshold. Default: "lightgoldenrod2"

param.name: color_for_features_meeting_pvalue_and_foldchange_thresholds
param.label: Color for features meeting p-value and fold-change thresholds
param.help: Color of the features that meet both the p-value and fold change thresholds. Default: "red"

param.name: flip_vplot
param.label: Flip Contrast
param.help: Set to TRUE to flip the fold change values so that the volcano plot looks like a comparison was B-A. Default: FALSE

param.name: use_default_x_axis_limit
param.label: Use Default X-Axis Limit
param.help: Set to TRUE to use the default x-axis limit. Default: TRUE

param.name: x_axis_limit
param.label: X-Axis Limit
param.help: Custom x-axis limit. Default: c(-5, 5)

param.name: use_default_y_axis_limit
param.label: Use Default Y-Axis Limit
param.help: Set to TRUE to use the default y-axis limit. Default: TRUE

param.name: y_axis_limit
param.label: Y-Axis Limit
param.help: Custom y-axis limit. Default: c(0, 10)

param.name: point_size
param.label: Point Size
param.help: Size of the points in the plot. Default: 1

param.name: add_deg_columns
param.label: Add DEG Columns to Output Table
param.help: Add additional columns from the DEG analysis to the output dataset. Default: `"FC", "logFC", "tstat", "pval", "adjpval"`

param.name: image_width
param.label: Image Width
param.help: output image width in pixels - only used if save_plots is TRUE

param.name: image_height
param.label: Image Height
param.help: output image height in pixels - only used if save_plots is TRUE

param.name: dpi
param.label: Image Resolution
param.help: dots-per-inch of the output image (see `ggsave()`) - only used if save_plots is TRUE

param.name: use_default_grid_layout
param.label: Use Default Grid Layout
param.help: Set to TRUE to use the default grid layout. Default: TRUE

param.name: number_of_rows_in_grid_layout
param.label: Number of Rows in Grid Layout
param.help: Number of rows in the grid layout. Default: 1

param.name: aspect_ratio
param.label: Figure Aspect Ratio
param.help: Aspect ratio of the output image. Default: 4/3

param.name: save_plots
param.label: Save Plots
param.help: Whether to save plots to files during analysis (Defaults to `TRUE`, overwritable using option 'moo_save_plots' or environment variable 'MOO_SAVE_PLOTS')

tool.help:
**Plot Volcano - Summary**
Runs `MOSuite::plot_volcano_summary()` - https://ccbr.github.io/MOSuite/reference/plot_volcano_summary.html`
Produces one volcano plot for each tested contrast in the input DEG table. It can be sorted by either fold change, t-statistic, or p-value. The returned dataset includes one row for each significant gene in each contrast, and contains columns from the DEG analysis of that contrast as well as columns useful to the Venn diagram template downstream.
**Outputs:**
- DataFrame: file (summary_dataframe.rds) - figures: file (figures/diff/volcano_summary.png)
**Version info**
- Docker: nciccbr/mosuite:v0.2.1.9001_5808374 - GitHub: CCBR/MOSuite-Galaxy @ `3bf5456` - https://github.com/CCBR/MOSuite-Galaxy/tree/3bf5456
